verses.roman:
satyarāja bale,--vaiṣṇava ciniba kemane?
ke vaiṣṇava, kaha tāṅra sāmānya lakṣaṇe

synonyms: satyarāja bale—Satyarāja Khān said; vaiṣṇava—a Vaiṣṇava; ciniba kemane—how shall I recognize; ke vaiṣṇava—who is a Vaiṣṇava; kaha—please say; tāṅra—of him; sāmānya lakṣaṇe—common symptoms.
translation: Upon hearing this, Satyarāja said, "How can I recognize a Vaiṣṇava? Please let me know what a Vaiṣṇava is. What are his common symptoms?"
